name: OrbitaASSISTNurse
0:
”Alexa, ask the nurse to bring me a drink.”
”Alexa, tell the nurse to bring food.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the nurse
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Orbita Assist Nurse Model for Orbita's virtual bedside assistant empowering hands-free patient-provider communication for the patient and healthcare team.

AI-powered request prioritization and smart-routing requests the right resource to meet the patient’s needs.
